style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 2.02. Results of Operations and Financial Condition</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">On </span><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">January&#160;23, 2020</span><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">, Comcast Corporation (&#8220;Comcast&#8221;) issued a press release reporting the results of its operations for the three and twelve months ended </span><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</span><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">. The press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1. Exhibit 99.2 sets forth the reasons Comcast believes that presentation of the non-GAAP financial measures contained in the press release provides useful information to investors regarding Comcast's results of operations and financial condition. To the extent material, Exhibit 99.2 also discloses the additional purposes, if any, for which Comcast's management uses these non-GAAP financial measures.&#160; A reconciliation of these non-GAAP financial measures with the most directly comparable GAAP financial measures is included in the press release itself.  Comcast does not intend for this Item 2.02 or Exhibit 99.1 or Exhibit 99.2 to be treated as "filed" under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, or incorporated by reference into its filings under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;"><br/></span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;"><br/></span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 9.01. style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold;">&#32;AND FULL YEAR </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold;">&#32;RESULTS</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">PHILADELPHIA - </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">January&#160;23, 2020</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#8230;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ: CMCSA) today reported results for the quarter and year ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:3pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:3pt;">&#160;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Brian L. Roberts, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Comcast Corporation, said, "We delivered strong operational and financial results in the fourth quarter, capping another great year for Comcast, including double-digit growth in full-year adjusted EPS, record free cash flow and 1.4 million broadband net additions in the U.S. Our teams at Cable, NBCUniversal and Sky continued to execute at a high level, strengthening our leadership position in our markets. Looking ahead, in 2020 we are leaning into exciting opportunities, including: further differentiating our broadband product in the U.S. through innovations like Flex and xFi Advanced Security; accelerating the deployment of Sky Q; launching a new broadband service in Italy; debuting Super Nintendo World at Universal Studios Japan; and introducing a world-class streaming service - Peacock - which leverages capabilities from across Comcast. Underscoring our confidence in the continued success of our company, we are pleased to announce a 10% increase in our dividend, our 12th consecutive annual increase."</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:6px;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" Comcast</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">25.9%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Consolidated net income attributable to Comcast increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">11.3%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$13.1 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">13.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$34.3 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Earnings per Share (EPS)</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;for the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$0.68</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, an increase of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">23.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. On an adjusted basis, EPS increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">9.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$0.79</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;(see Table 5).</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, EPS was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.83</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, a </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">11.9%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increase compared to the prior year. On an adjusted basis, EPS increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">14.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$3.13</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;(see Table 5).</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Capital Expenditures</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$3.1 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Cable Communications&#8217; capital expenditures decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">7.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.1 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. NBCUniversal&#8217;s capital expenditures increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">7.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$641 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Sky had capital expenditures of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$228 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, capital expenditures increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$10.0 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Cable Communications' capital expenditures decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">10.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$6.9 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. NBCUniversal's capital expenditures increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">19.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.1 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Sky had capital expenditures of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$768 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Net Cash Provided by Operating Activities </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$6.2 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#32;Free Cash Flow</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.5</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;billion (see Table 4).</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, net cash provided by operating activities was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$25.7 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Free cash flow was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$13.4</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;billion (see Table 4). </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Dividends </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">paid during the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;totaled </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$957 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. For the full year, Comcast made four cash dividend payments totaling </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$3.7 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Today Comcast announced that it increased its dividend by 10% to $0.92 per share on an annualized basis for 2020. In accordance with the increase, the Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.23 a share on the company's stock, payable April 22, 2020 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on April 1, 2020.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold;">Consolidated Pro Forma Financial Results </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Pro forma results are presented as if the Sky transaction occurred on January 1, 2017. The pro forma amounts are based on historical results of operations and are primarily adjusted for the allocation of purchase price and excluding&#160;costs directly related to the transaction. These amounts are not necessarily indicative of what our results would have been had we operated Sky since January 1, 2017 (see Table 7 for reconciliations of pro forma financial data).</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Consolidated Pro Forma Revenue</font><font billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Consolidated</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Pro Forma Adjusted EBITDA</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$8.4 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font Consolidated Pro Forma Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">5.9%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$34.3 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font></div><div style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:6px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:10px;text-align:justify;font-size:8pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:8pt;">Beginning in the first quarter of 2019, Cable Communications results include our wireless phone service and certain other business development initiatives which were previously presented in Corporate and Other. Prior periods have been adjusted to reflect this presentation.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Revenue</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;for Cable Communications increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$14.8 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, driven primarily by increases in high-speed internet, business services and wireless revenue, partially offset by a decrease in advertising revenue. High-speed internet revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">8.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, driven by an increase in the number of residential high-speed internet customers and rate adjustments. Business services revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">8.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, due to an increase in the number of customers receiving our services and an increase in average rates. Wireless revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">39.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting an increase in the number of customer lines. Advertising revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">19.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting a decrease in political advertising revenue. Excluding political advertising revenue, advertising revenue was consistent with the prior year period. Video revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.2%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting a decrease in the number of residential video customers, partially offset by rate adjustments. Voice revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">3.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily due to a decrease in the number of residential voice customers. Other revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.3%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting the timing of X1 licensing revenue, partially offset by higher security and automation services revenue.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, Cable revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">3.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$58.1 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, driven by growth in high-speed internet, business services, wireless and other revenue, partially offset by a decrease in advertising, video and voice revenue.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Total Customer Relationships </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">372,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">31.5</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Residential customer relationships increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">352,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;and business customer relationships increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">20,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Total high-speed internet customer net additions were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">442,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, total video customer net losses were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">149,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, total voice customer net losses were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;and total security and automation customer net additions were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">10,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. In addition, Cable Communications added </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">261,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;wireless lines in the quarter.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the year ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, total customer relationships increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.1 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Residential customer relationships increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.0 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;and business customer relationships increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">94,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Total high-speed internet customer net additions were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.4 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, total video customer net losses were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">733,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, total voice customer net losses were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">173,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;and total security and automation customer net additions were </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">59,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. In addition, Cable Communications added </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">816,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;wireless lines during the year.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div><br></div><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:8pt;"><font style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div></td><td style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="text-align:right;font-size:8pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:8pt;font-weight:bold;">854</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div></td><td style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Adjusted EBITDA</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;for Cable Communications increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">5.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$5.9 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting higher revenue, partially offset by a </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">0.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increase in operating expenses.</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#ff0000;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Non-programming expenses increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting higher technical and product support expenses, partially offset by lower other operating costs and advertising, marketing and promotional costs. Non-programming expenses per customer relationship decreased 1.9%. Programming costs decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">0.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;due to the timing of programming contract renewals and video subscriber declines. This quarter's Adjusted EBITDA per customer relationship increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, and Adjusted EBITDA margin was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">39.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">38.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Cable Communications results include a loss of $</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">116</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;million from our wireless business, compared to a loss of $</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">191</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;million in the prior period.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, Cable Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">7.3%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$23.3 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, driven by higher revenue, partially offset by a </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increase in operating expenses. The higher expenses were due to a </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increase in non-programming expenses and a </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;increase in programming costs. For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, Adjusted EBITDA per customer relationship increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">3.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, and Adjusted EBITDA margin was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">40.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">38.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Cable Communications results include a loss of $</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">401</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;million from our wireless business, compared to a loss of $</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">743</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;million in the prior period.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Capital Expenditures </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">for Cable Communications decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">7.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.1 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Cable capital expenditures represented </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">14.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;of Cable revenue in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">16.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in last year's </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, Cable capital expenditures decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">10.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$6.9 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Cable capital expenditures represented </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">11.9%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;of Cable revenue compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">13.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;"><br></font></div><div style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Revenue </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">for NBCUniversal decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.6%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$9.2 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Adjusted EBITDA</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">4.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.0 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, NBCUniversal revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">5.0%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$34.0 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to last year's results, which included an incremental $1.6 billion of revenue generated by the broadcasts of the 2018 PyeongChang Olympics and the NFL's Super Bowl LII at our TV Businesses. Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.0%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$8.8 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Cable Networks</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Cable Networks revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.2%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.9 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting higher advertising and content licensing and other revenue. Advertising revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.0%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting higher rates, partially offset by audience ratings declines. Content licensing and other revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">3.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, due to higher revenue from our digital businesses. Distribution revenue was consistent with the prior year period, reflecting contractual rate increases and the timing of contract renewals, offset by a decline in subscribers. Adjusted EBITDA decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$1.0 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting higher revenue, more than offset by an increase in operating costs and expenses.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, revenue from the Cable Networks segment decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.2%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$11.5 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting lower content licensing and other and advertising revenue. Excluding </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$378 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;of revenue generated by the broadcast of the 2018 PyeongChang Olympics in the first quarter of 2018, Cable Networks revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.0%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;(see Table 6). Adjusted EBITDA of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$4.4 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;was consistent with the prior year period, reflecting lower revenue, offset by a decrease in operating costs and expenses, including programming and production costs, due to the broadcast of the 2018 PyeongChang Olympics in the first quarter of 2018.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Broadcast Television</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Broadcast Television revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$3.2 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting higher distribution and other and content licensing revenue, partially offset by a decrease in advertising revenue. Distribution and other revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">9.9%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily due to higher retransmission consent fees. Content licensing revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">5.8%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily due to the timing of content provided under licensing agreements. Advertising revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, due to a decrease in political advertising revenue. Excluding political advertising revenue, advertising revenue increased in the low-single-digits, reflecting higher pricing, partially offset by audience ratings declines. Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">14.2%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$471 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting higher revenue and consistent operating costs and expenses.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div><br></div><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:8pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:8pt;">5</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:8pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:8pt;"><br></font></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div><br></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, revenue from the Broadcast Television segment decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">10.3%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$10.3 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting a decrease in advertising revenue.</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#ff0000;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Excluding </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$770 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;of revenue generated by the broadcast of the 2018 PyeongChang Olympics in the first quarter of 2018 and </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$423 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;of revenue generated by the broadcast of the NFL's Super Bowl LII in the first quarter of 2018, Broadcast Television revenue of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$10.3 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;was consistent with the prior year period (see Table 6).</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#ff0000;">&#32;</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">4.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$1.7 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, with lower revenue more than offset by a decrease in programming and production costs, primarily due to decreased sports programming costs associated with the broadcasts of the 2018 PyeongChang Olympics and the NFL's Super Bowl LII in the first quarter of 2018.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Filmed Entertainment</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Filmed Entertainment revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">21.0%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$1.6 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting lower theatrical revenue. Theatrical revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">59.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting the volume and strength of releases in last year's </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter, including </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;">Dr. Seuss' The Grinch</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:10pt;">&#32;and </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;">Halloween</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Adjusted EBITDA decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">48.9%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$91 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting lower revenue, partially offset by lower programming and production costs.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, revenue from the Filmed Entertainment segment decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">9.2%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$6.5 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, primarily reflecting lower theatrical revenue, partially offset by higher content licensing revenue. Adjusted EBITDA increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">13.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$833 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting lower revenue, more than offset by lower operating expenses.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Theme Parks</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Theme Parks revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">3.2%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$1.6 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, due to increases in guest spending. Adjusted EBITDA decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">4.5%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$636 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting higher revenue, more than offset by higher operating expenses.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, revenue from the Theme Parks segment increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">4.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$5.9 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, due to increases in guest spending and higher attendance. Adjusted EBITDA of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$2.5 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;was consistent with the prior year period, reflecting an increase in revenue, offset by higher operating expenses.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">Headquarters, Other and Eliminations</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">NBCUniversal Headquarters, Other and Eliminations include overhead and eliminations among the NBCUniversal businesses. For the quarter ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, NBCUniversal Headquarters, Other and Eliminations Adjusted EBITDA loss was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$204 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, compared to a loss of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$176 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, NBCUniversal Headquarters, Other and Eliminations Adjusted EBITDA loss was </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$690 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to a loss of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$676 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. </font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;"><br></font></div><div><br></div><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:8pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:8pt;">6</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:8pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:8pt;"><br></font></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div><br></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold;">Sky</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">Pro forma results are presented as if the Sky transaction occurred on January 1, 2017. The pro forma amounts are based on historical results of operations and are primarily adjusted for the allocation of purchase price and excluding&#160;costs directly related to the transaction. These amounts are not necessarily indicative of what our results would have been had we operated Sky since January 1, 2017, (see Table 7 for reconciliations of pro forma financial data).</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="5"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:20%;"></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#d9d9d6;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Pro Forma Revenue </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">for Sky of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$5.0 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;was consistent with the prior year period. Excluding the impact of currency, revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.4%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, driven by higher direct-to-consumer and content revenue, partially offset by lower advertising revenue. Direct-to-consumer revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.3%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$4.0 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, driven by an increase in customer relationships. Content revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$371 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting higher rates for wholesaling of our programming. Advertising revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">4.1%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$647 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting an unfavorable impact from a change in legislation related to gambling advertisements in the UK and Italy, as well as overall market weakness.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, pro forma Sky revenue decreased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">3.0%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">$19.2 billion</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;compared to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2018</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. Excluding the impact of currency, revenue increased </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">1.7%</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, reflecting growth in content and direct-to-consumer revenue, partially offset by lower advertising revenue.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Pro Forma Total Customer Relationships </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">77,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;to </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">24.0 million</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;in the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">fourth</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;quarter of </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">. For the </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">twelve</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#32;months ended </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">December&#160;31, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">, total customer relationships increased by </font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">394,000</font><font style="font-family:Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">.</font></div><div
